languages.text: {n}Голос Джай звучит тихо и угрожающе:{/n} "Осторожно, Пощада. Я видела, как умирают и за менее неаккуратно выбранные слова, сказанные Вольному Торговцу".
{n}Jae's voice is low and threatening:{/n} "Choose your words carefully, Mercy. People with greater prudence than you have died for a slip of the tongue in the Rogue Trader's presence."
languages.original_text: {n}Голос Джай звучит тихо и угрожающе:{/n} "Осторожно, Пощада. Я видела, как умирают и за менее неаккуратно выбранные слова, сказанные Вольному Торговцу".

traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}婕伊以低沉的声音开了口，话语中满是威胁的意味。{/n}“说话要当心点，悯慈。哪怕是比你更位高权重的人，若是在行商浪人面前失言，也只会人头落地。”
languages.original_text: {n}Jae's voice is low and threatening:{/n} "Choose your words carefully, Mercy. People with greater prudence than you have died for a slip of the tongue in the Rogue Trader's presence."

traits.locale_text: {n}婕伊以低沉的声音开了口，话语中满是威胁的意味。{/n}“说话要当心点，悯慈。哪怕是比你更位高权重的人，若是在行商浪人面前失言，也只会人头落地。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}ジェイの声は低く、威嚇的なものだった。{/n}「慎重に言葉を選ぶんだね、マーシー。自由開拓者の前で迂闊なことを言ったせいで命を落とした人は、他にもたくさんいるんだから」
languages.original_text: {n}Jae's voice is low and threatening:{/n} "Choose your words carefully, Mercy. People with greater prudence than you have died for a slip of the tongue in the Rogue Trader's presence."

traits.locale_text: {n}ジェイの声は低く、威嚇的なものだった。{/n}「慎重に言葉を選ぶんだね、マーシー。自由開拓者の前で迂闊なことを言ったせいで命を落とした人は、他にもたくさんいるんだから」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae contesta con tono grave y amenazador:{/n} «Elige tus palabras con cuidado, Mercy. Gente más prudente que tú ha muerto por un desliz en presencia de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente».
languages.original_text: {n}Jae's voice is low and threatening:{/n} "Choose your words carefully, Mercy. People with greater prudence than you have died for a slip of the tongue in the Rogue Trader's presence."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae contesta con tono grave y amenazador:{/n} «Elige tus palabras con cuidado, Mercy. Gente más prudente que tú ha muerto por un desliz en presencia de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae intervient d'une voix grave et menaçante :{/n} « Fais très attention à ce que tu dis, Mercy. Des gens bien plus prudents que toi ont perdu la vie pour s'être mal exprimés en présence {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}. »
languages.original_text: {n}Jae's voice is low and threatening:{/n} "Choose your words carefully, Mercy. People with greater prudence than you have died for a slip of the tongue in the Rogue Trader's presence."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae intervient d'une voix grave et menaçante :{/n} « Fais très attention à ce que tu dis, Mercy. Des gens bien plus prudents que toi ont perdu la vie pour s'être mal exprimés en présence {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae spricht leise und bedrohlich:{/n} "Wählt Eure Worte mit Bedacht, Mercy. Es soll schon Menschen gegeben haben, die mehr Besonnenheit an den Tag gelegt haben als Ihr und die dann wegen eines Versprechers durch die Hand {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} sterben mussten."
languages.original_text: {n}Jae's voice is low and threatening:{/n} "Choose your words carefully, Mercy. People with greater prudence than you have died for a slip of the tongue in the Rogue Trader's presence."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae spricht leise und bedrohlich:{/n} "Wählt Eure Worte mit Bedacht, Mercy. Es soll schon Menschen gegeben haben, die mehr Besonnenheit an den Tag gelegt haben als Ihr und die dann wegen eines Versprechers durch die Hand {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} sterben mussten."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae'ın sesi, hafif ve tehditkâr çıkıyor.{/n} "Sözlerini dikkatli seç Merhamet. Senden daha tedbirli insanların bir dil sürçmesi nedeniyle Hür Tacir'in huzurunda hayatlarını kaybettikleri olmuştur."
languages.original_text: {n}Jae's voice is low and threatening:{/n} "Choose your words carefully, Mercy. People with greater prudence than you have died for a slip of the tongue in the Rogue Trader's presence."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae'ın sesi hafif ve tehditkâr.{/n} "Sözlerini dikkatli seç Merhamet. Senden daha tedbirli insanların bir dil sürçmesi nedeniyle Hür Tacir'in huzurunda hayatlarını kaybettikleri olmuştur."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
